Translations.Text: Those who believe and do not cover their belief with injustice, those are the persons for whom there is security and they are (rightly) guided
And that was Our argument which We gave to Ibrahim against his people, We elevate the grades of whom We will. Your Fosterer is certainly Wise, Knowing

And We granted him Ishaq and Yaqub, each did We guide, and earlier We had guided Nuh and from his descendants Dawood and Sulaiman and Iyub and Yusuf and Musa and Harun and thus do We reward those who do good
and Zakariyya and Yahya and Isa and Ilyas, each one was of the righteous
and Ismael and Elisha and Yunus and Lut and each one (of them) We preferred over (all others in) the worlds
and from among their forefathers and their descendants and their brothers, and We chose them and We guided them to the straight path
That's the guidance of Allah, He guides thereby whom He wills of His servants, and if they associate partners (with Allah), all that they used to do would become fruitless for them
Those were the persons to whom We gave the book (law) and the judgment and the prophet hood; but if these do not believe in it, then We have entrusted with it, a people who will not be infidels to it
Those were the persons whom Allah guided, therefore follow (religion) according to their guidance. Say, "I do not ask you for any reward for it; it is nothing but a reminder for the worlds
